Catalonia Giralda

This magnificent hotel is located in the historic centre of Seville. Everything is close by, including the Giralda tower, the most important neighbourhoods of Seville and all the ambiance to have a ball in this city with so many places to discover. All the rooms at the Catalonia Giralda hotel are outward-facing.

It has an eclectic style so is visible in the façade and in the main marble staircase, which have been left in their original versions. In order to provide space for the hotel’s facilities, extension work was carried out joining it with the building next-door; resulting in a hotel with a warm and comfortable atmosphere that satisfies the customer’s expectations.

Location: Gran Via Madrid

Category: 4 stars

Restaurants: 1 Restaurant and 1 bar

Wifi: Available in rooms and common areas
